docs.abstract: Monica Ball letter, prompted by March 26 article on vegan firefighters in Austin, Tex, applauds vegan firefighters for improving their health
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Firefighters Gone Vegan? Even Austin Is Impressed'' (news article, March 26):
docs.snippet: To the Editor:     Re ''Firefighters Gone Vegan? Even Austin Is Impressed'' (news article, March 26):
